discord.guild.join:
Thank you for adding SSBUBot to your server! Please have someone with the "Manage Server" permission follow the setup instructions at [https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup](https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup).

If you have received this message more than once, this is because you have not run the ``ssbu.register`` command in this server. This is a reminder to do so.
discord.guild.deregister: Your server cannot receive Smash notifications because SSBUBot cannot send messages to the registered channel. Please check that the channel exists and that SSBUBot has permissions to send messages to it. Someone with the "Manage Server" permission must run the ``ssbu.register`` command again to re-register this server once the issue has been resolved. Go to [https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup](https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup) for more information.
discord.error.unknown_command: Unknown command. For a list of commands, see ``ssbu.help``.
discord.error.bad_arguments: Not enough arguments. See ``ssbu.help`` for command help.
discord.error.exception: An error has occurred. SSBUBot's owners have been notified.
discord.error.bad_code: This language code is invalid. You can see a list of valid language codes by running ``ssbu.languages``.
event.not_found: No event exists with this ID.
line_news.title: Line News ({0})
line_news.not_found: No line news exists with this ID.
popup_news.not_found: No pop-up news exists with this ID.
present.not_found: No present exists with this ID.
invite.title: Invite
invite.description: Please go to [https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup](https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup) for instructions on how to invite SSBUBot to your server.
list.title: List
registration.title: Success
registration.in_dm: This command must be run in a server.
registration.user_no_manage_permission: You must have the "Manage Server" permission to register this server.
registration.bot_no_write_permission: SSBUBot does not have permission to send messages to the specified channel.
registration.bad_code: The language code is invalid. Please check the [setup guide](https://smash.oatmealdome.me/setup) or run ``ssbu.languages`` for valid codes.
support.title: Support
support.description: If you need a list of commands, type ``ssbu.help``. If you need help with using or setting up the bot, please join OatmealDome's server: https://discord.gg/rdx6Bt8
